title: Seasonal Latte
description: A cozy seasonal latte infused with pumpkin spice and rich caramel, topped with a delicate foam that makes every sip feel like autumn in a cup.

title: Artisan Croissant
description: Handcrafted with layers of flaky, buttery pastry, this artisan croissant is baked fresh daily to deliver a golden crisp outside and a soft, airy inside.

title: Pour Over
description: A carefully brewed pour-over coffee featuring rotating single-origin beans, highlighting unique flavor notes with a clean, aromatic finish.

title: Classic Cappuccino
description: A timeless cappuccino crafted with bold espresso and velvety steamed milk, finished with a frothy crown for a balanced, rich taste.

title: Avocado Toast
description: Freshly smashed avocado served on toasted sourdough, sprinkled with chili flakes and a hint of lemon for a refreshing, savory bite.

title: Matcha Green Tea
description: Premium ceremonial-grade matcha whisked to perfection, offering a smooth, earthy flavor and a vibrant green hue that energizes naturally.

title: Blueberry Muffin
description: A moist, fluffy muffin bursting with fresh blueberries and topped with a sweet, crumbly streusel for the perfect morning treat.

title: Iced Cold Brew
description: Smooth and refreshing cold brew steeped for 24 hours, delivering bold flavor with a naturally sweet finish served over ice.

title: Club Sandwich
description: A hearty triple-layered sandwich stacked with turkey, crispy bacon, fresh lettuce, and ripe tomato, served on toasted bread.

title: Espresso Shot
description: A bold double shot of our house blend espresso, delivering intense flavor and a quick boost of energy.

title: Berry Smoothie
description: A refreshing blend of mixed berries, creamy yogurt, and a drizzle of honey, creating a naturally sweet and nutritious smoothie.

title: New York Cheesecake
description: A decadent slice of classic New York-style cheesecake, rich and creamy, topped with a drizzle of strawberry sauce.
